showerReviews.reviewText: Lots of spaces, and they have a  McDonalds on site. There is a large, clean store, and the restrooms were clean.

It is a smaller Pilot, but it is really clean and well organized. Easy to get into with our nüCamp travel trailer, clean lot, working pumps and card readers, clean restroom with goop-like hand cleanser, and several self checkout kiosks that were actually really easy to use. There’s a McDonalds attached.

I go to alot of Pilots but I have to say this is by far the most clean and well maintained Pilot I have been to and the staff is very friendly.
The staff takes really good care of this location if your from Pilot Corporate and reading this I just want you to know this location got it right.

showerReviews.reviewText: … Park is conveniently located on Sadler Road where it meets the ocean. Our favorite ocean access point. Always clean and it even has an outdoor shower. Nice to be able to wash some of the sand off before getting back inside your vehicle.

… that features live music. Walking, swimming, surfing, fishing, beach tailgaiting. The swim flag is usually, "yellow". Open 24/7, just can't park there from midnight to 5am. Bathrooms are open! Outdoor shower. Frequent dolphin sightings.
Restrooms are closed at sunset, ample parking, traffic circle so no traffic backup when leaving, rinse off open air shower at parking lot, and the OCEAN! Beach is clean and relaxing.
